comments:

Does this happen every time you try to run?
It was consistently happening in one of my Sun workspaces, but not the new one I created.

PW
Created an attachment (id=34872)
patch with fix

fix released; here's the stand-alone snippet that isolated the problem:

public static void main(String[] args) {
	final Display display = new Display();
	final Shell shell = new Shell(display);
	shell.setBounds(10,10,500,500);
	final Tree tree = new Tree(shell, SWT.MULTI);
	tree.setBounds(10,10,400,400);
	TreeItem item0 = new TreeItem(tree, SWT.NONE);
	item0.setText("item 0");
	new TreeItem(item0, SWT.NONE).setText("item 1");;
	tree.selectAll();
	shell.addListener(SWT.MouseDown, new Listener() {
		public void handleEvent(Event event) {
			tree.deselectAll();
		}
	});
	shell.open();
	while (!shell.isDisposed()) {
		if (!display.readAndDispatch()) display.sleep();
	}
	display.dispose();
}
